topics.body:
Here's a terrible attempt at making an english version of the "Ohranger theme.":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Yn2nlnS9RE

"Dash! Dash! Ohranger!

Dash! Dash! Ohranger!

The Life of our planet is fading away, So hurry! (Dash!) Ohranger!

An empire of Soulless machines is heading towards our earth!

To destroy all that we love, All of great worth!

But if we all, Stand up tall, And fight for, all that we love!

THERE WILL BE NOTHING TO FEAR FROM BARANOIA!

If we start running fast! We are unstoppable! (Olé!)

If we stand together! We are Undefeatable! (Olé!)

Our Dreams of peace will never die if we stand tall!

Olé! Olé! Olé! Ohranger!"
